definition: to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
to love sth too much to part with it (idiom); to fondle admiringly
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
as if relieved from a burden (idiom)/to have a weight off one's mind
to release (tension)/relief (from suspense)/to dispel (usu. with negative, unable to forget)
the meaning of sth/an explanation of the meaning of words or phrases/definition/an interpretation (of doctrine)/religious doctrine
to dispel doubts/to clear up difficulties

sentences.english: These constructional coercions account for the reversibility restrictions of some S-O reversible sentences.
sentences.chinese: 這些構式壓制爲易位的限制條件和原因提供瞭解釋。

sentences.english: Buy time phenomenon to give understanding to what happen in daily life finally commentate.
sentences.chinese: 最後對日常生活中發生的購買時間現象給予瞭解釋。

sentences.english: But Li Songwei, a doctor of psychology at Peking University, has an explanation.
sentences.chinese: 對此，北京大學心理學博士李松蔚作出瞭解釋。

sentences.english: Various hypotheses which were presented by other au- thors for interpretation of albino occurrence were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論瞭解釋花粉白苗發生機理的各種觀點。

sentences.english: I have a dog named Olay, it's a Shih Tzu breed.
sentences.chinese: 我有一隻狗叫的玉蘭油，這是一個釋慈濟的品種。

sentences.english: Example:1. If that be so, we shall take action at once.
sentences.chinese: 如果情況釋那樣，我們就立刻採取行動。

sentences.english: Your radiologist attends the fair to assist in interpreting these screening tests.
sentences.chinese: 你們的放療師參與並提供瞭解釋和檢查。

sentences.english: China-Japan tea culture has been seeped through with three schools of thought—Confucianism, Taoism and Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 中日茶文化都滲透了儒道釋三家思想。

sentences.english: I have come to realize that this is a poorly worded question.
sentences.chinese: 筆者意識到這是一個很難解釋的問題。

sentences.english: To most people the law of relativity is difficult to explain.
sentences.chinese: 對大多數人來說，相對性的規律很難解釋。

sentences.english: Last year's Colorblind trend was easy to spot , but hard to explain.
sentences.chinese: 去年的色盲的趨勢是容易被發現，但很難解釋。

sentences.english: I always like to "youth, " the word interpreted as "Try the spring.
sentences.chinese: 我總喜歡將“青春”二字，釋爲“青澀的春天”。

sentences.english: Chapter IV analyzes the founding way and regulatory system of the judge' s power of legal interpretation in China.
sentences.chinese: 第四章分析了我國法官釋法權的構建途徑和規制。

sentences.english: I am also aware that Ms. Hedegaard has made an explanation over that.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到赫澤高女士自己已作出相識釋。

sentences.english: Acting is hard to explain, because it always sounds pompous.
sentences.chinese: 表演很難解釋，因爲它聽起來總是華爾不實。

sentences.english: This time-lag is difficult to explain, but there are three.
sentences.chinese: 這種時滯現象很難解釋，但可能有三個原因。
